sourcesContent:
export const backdropStyle = (props) => {

    return {
        zIndex: "3",
        backgroundColor: "#000",
        opacity: ".3",
        position: "fixed",
        width: "100%",
        height: "100%",
        top: "0",
        left: "0",
        cursor: "pointer",
        transition: "background .3s ease-out 0",
        ...props.style,
    }
}
